title: Bug 11442Labels of CheckedTreeSelectionDialog aren't localized
description: Bug 11442Labels of CheckedTreeSelectionDialog aren't localized (SeecreateSelectionButtons()).The class SelectionDialog (which is one of itssuperclasses) already provides localized labels I think.So you might want toreplace the hard coded names with SelectionDialog.SELECTALLTITLE andSelectionDialog.DESELECTALLTITLE (or add your own translation).Even better, because "select all" and "select none" are used quite often, tellthe Platform/JFace team to add these to the IDialogConstants interface class.
OB: The button labels of the CheckedTreeSelectionDialog aren't localized.
